name: Cold Shadow (SNES) v2.5
description:
[Arrow keys] - Walk, Jump and crouch / hide.

[Space] - Attack (Quickly for combos)

[Q] - Quit (save score)

Tips: ★ Hold jump longer for higher jumps

★ Jump up between walls to wall climb

★ Jump and Hit the little flashing duck heads to swing!

This is two levels of the original game "Cold Shadow"."

Cold Shadow" was a game released in 1995 on the SNES by Disney Interactive featuring Donald Duck (aka Maui Mallard). All graphics, sounds and level design are copyright Disney Interactive.
